items.title: Zenith Labs Raises $30M Series C
items.summary: Zenith Labs closed $30M Series C led by Accel. They plan to expand into enterprise segment — directly competing with our mid-market positioning.
items.insight: Accelerate enterprise feature development. Position our 2-year head start in enterprise as key differentiator. Update competitive battle cards.

items.title: Meridian Corp Cuts Pricing by 15%
items.summary: Meridian Corp announced aggressive pricing cuts across all tiers. Our sources indicate they're losing deals on feature depth and compensating with price.
items.insight: Do NOT match pricing. Double down on value selling and ROI stories. Their support quality is declining — leverage in competitive deals.

items.title: DataFlow Acquires SmartSync (Acq-hire)
items.summary: DataFlow acquired SmartSync's 12-person engineering team. SmartSync had strong real-time sync capabilities — likely strengthening DataFlow's core product.
items.insight: Monitor DataFlow product updates closely. Their real-time sync was previously a weakness — this acquisition addresses it. Update sales objection handling.

items.title: Enterprise AI Platform Market Growing 42% CAGR
items.summary: New Gartner report projects enterprise AI platform market to reach $84B by 2028 (42% CAGR). Autonomous agents identified as fastest-growing segment.
items.insight: Use in Series B materials and investor conversations. Validates our thesis. Include in board deck market size slide.
